title: Australian cricketer Shane Watson’s Instagram account hacked
text:
Australian cricketer Shane Watson have fallen prey to social media hacking as his official Instagram account being hacked on Tuesday.

The hackers started posting unusual stuff on Watson’s account and also changed his bio to “@BRAVERY ON SNAP, JOIN SHADOW REALM , LINK IN BIO !”

The hackers also posted images on his Instagram Stories which urged his fans to follow a link and download a video before they would release a full version.

This is the second time that the 38-year-old cricketer became victim of a bizarre hack, on Friday his official Twitter account was accessed for nearly half-an-hour during which a series of tweets were posted as well as his account name was also changed to ‘crimin.al’ and his bio to “FREE DA GUYS”.

Later, the cricketer resumed the control of his Twitter account, with the previously posted and retweeted tweets deleted, but unfortunately his Instagram account is still not recovered yet.
